attributes.action: put the army onto the streets of Britain to deal with the current lawlessness in our communities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current trend in crime in which the perpetrators have absolutely no regard for their victims is leading to societies living in constant fear. Read any local paper and every page reports shootings, stabbings and families being threatenend and assaulted in their own homes by burglars high on drugs and with no regard for the police or British justice system. The British army should be patrolling our streets and keeping our parents and children safe.

rejection.details: This petition presents opinion as fact.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
